snippet.title: ATELIER TOTORI: THE ADVENTURER OF ARLAND OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Atelier Totori follows the story of a new alchemist and her travels around Arland several years after the events of Atelier Rorona: The Alchemist of Arland. Fans of Rorona will surely enjoy Totori?s story as well as the more in-depth synthesis and battle systems! 

Official Site: http://www.nisamerica.com/games/atelier-totori/

Facebook: http://facebook.com/nisaeurope
Twitter: http://twitter.com/NISAinEurope
